Description.High greenhouse gas emission: This is the Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP8.5). It is assumed that greenhouse gas concentration rises throughout the 21st century, leading to a radiative forcing of 8.5 W/m^2 in 2100, which corresponds to a likely range of global temperature increase of 2.6째C to 4.8째C with respect to the reference period 1986-2005.
Description.Intermediate greenhouse gas emission: This is the Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP4.5). It is assumed that the greenhouse gas concentration peaks in 2040 and then declines, leading to a radiative forcing of 4.5 W/m^2 in 2100, which corresponds to a likely range of global temperature increase of 1.1째C to 2.6째C with respect to the reference period 1986-2005.
